reviews.sentence: Friendly clean and well equipped. I chose this hotel because of its TripAdvisor reviews and it definitely did not disappoint. While the building has definitely been around for a while the rooms were renovated very clean and equipped with everying that one would need for a simple beach vacation. The property is located about a 5minute walk from the beach itself but that places it near several restaurants of various cuisines. The staff was very friendly and the continental breakfast was basic but of good quality. it is not a luxury resort but for the price I paid this hotel is an easy recommendation.
Great place. Nice room updated in an older building. Very clean and friendly staff. Super location close to the beach 5 minute walk.

Consistently good here. We have been going to this Travelodge for over ten years now. It is so close to the beach. It is always kept in great repair with clean rooms and great staff. Every year something is updated or renewed to make it a better stay. I really appreciate the effort and love staying there.

Consistently good here. We have been going to this Travelodge for over ten years now. It is so close to the beach. It is always kept in great repair with clean rooms and great staff. Every year something is updated or renewed to make it a better stay. I really appreciate the effort and love staying there.

Recently upgraded. This is a very interesting place to stay and now my favorite when in San Diego. The rooms are in excellent shape due to renovations and good attentive care by the Manager. It is not the Hilton but it shares all the advantages of being conveniently located in La Jola. A short walk to the best beaches delightful restaurants very close by and some of the most exotic stores in the world almost next door. Buy a Bentley nearby dine with the best in the best restaurants and experience the uniqueness of La Jola. The Hotel is a niche know to only a few locals well maintained and comfortable at the lowest prices in La Jola. do not tell anyone else but remember that parking will be difficult. Stay for as short or as long as you want vacation or business in the most exquisite complex location in CA at very low cost.

Great stay. First stay at this location and had a great stay. The check in and out went very smoothly with helpful and friendly staff willing to give directions or any assistance we might need. Breakfast was continental but as advertised. Room had been remodeled and was very spacious with small kitchen table and chairs. All was very clean and comfortable and we had a very enjoyable trip. We will definitely return to this location and nearby beach within walking distance was huge plus.

Great Stay for a weekend at Wind and Sea Beach at a Budget Price. I spent the weekend here recently and enjoyed the best nights of sleep I have had in months. I asked for a room at the back towards the beach and also for handicap access. I was told that they have only 2 handicap rooms and that they are always booked way in advance. Parking is very tight here and if you drive a large car or a truck expect to walk from remote lot or street. Also be aware that there are stairs throughout the property and no elevators so not wheel chair accessible. Still I enjoyed the convenient location the very clean room the full amenities like free wifi excellent continental breakfast great coffee. My room and bed were comfortable and everything I needed was provided. Fridge Iron Flatscren wifi. The staff were extremely nice and helpful especially Trisha at front desk and Rosie and Chris on the mainenance staff. I met some nice people who were guests here during my stay. I would stay again in a heartbeat.

Great bargain without sacrificing a thing. Wonderful find. 3 blocks from beach. An older motel but refurbished to maximize everything from the mural by the pool and spa to cheerful paint job spotless maintenance and gardening cheerful flags to the free breakfast in the small lobby eat outside or in your room but most of all by the spectacularly friendly service really outstanding. We had a sick grand baby I left my wallet in the safe we wanted to know when high tide was and they were on top of it all with big smiles and real concern. When I complimented Olga who was at the desk she complimented us said we are always so happy. Why were we so happy. Because they made us feel so welcome. If you want a basic motel that has done everything it can to improve your stay this is it. A good price 3 blocks from a fantastic beach with rocks to climb on and surfers to watch just a few blocks from downtown LaJola just a little bit further to San Diego. If you want a bigger room or a larger bathroom get a suite but we were quite happy with our basic room. there is some special place on the third floor with its own balcony. The deck clerk will counsel you about what room would work for you. The bed was remarkably comfy. there is a new Friedrich a c for every room which is a top brand. We mainly used fan only.

Decent hotel in very beach friendly location. We came for a one night stay with our two boys ages 2 and 3. The location has its positives and negatives. It is very close to thebeach. The opposite side of the hotel is not so glamorous. big busy street with construction. Parking was available and easy to use. Walking to the sort of downtown La Jola Village was a bit of a hike. Our room was a suite and the only AC was a wall unit in the front sitting area hard to get the AC to reach into the back bedroom area to cool it down for sleeping. It looked like other rooms had similar situations with window wall units in the front of the rooms. The room had a kitchenette which was a microwave sink coffee maker and mini fridge. The fridge was actually pretty big so we were able to store a half gallon of milk some restaurant leftovers and other drinks snacks in it. There is only staircase access to the upper floors so if you are coming with kids strollers you may want to request a ground floor room in advance. Room cleanliness was pretty good but found a partially used bar of soap in the shower. Otherwise no issues as everything looked well maintained. TVs worked well and there was a decent selection of cable channels. WiFi worked well throughout the room. Pool and hot tub area looked nice but did not try it out myself. Overall it is an old facility and they have done their best to keep it updated.

A nostalgic gem. We loved the nostalgic feel of this Travelodge. Our room was clean and comfortable. The shower large and roomy. The staff was very helpful from Olga at the front desk to the maintenance man who wiped down the chairs and tables by the pool. And the beach is only a couple blocks away. We are excited to visit and stay here again.

Will stay here again as long as they do some remodeling. The comforters in the bedroom seemed like they were purchased in the early 80s so it brought down the rest of the experience. Overall though pretty happy with the location. Staff was super friendly room was very complete with sink fridge microwave etc. Just seems like it needs to be refreshed to take this place out of the 80s and advance a couple of decades.

Okay for the price. Centrally located in La Jola. There were unfortunately only smoking rooms available. In general I think there should not be any smoking rooms in any hotel around the world. Smokers should smoke outside so that all rooms stay free of smoke smell which always stays in the room no matter how often you spray. Furniture seems to be a bit run down. Bathroom is okay but not more than that. it is clean and economic but the floor and walls seems to have undergone a cheap renovation. Breakfast is not worth mentioning but there are a couple of good coffee places around the corner.

Good staff good potential owners need to reinvest to make it better. The Staff Erika in particular were really welcoming and helpful. Customer orientation has huge appeal. The location of the Travelodge was also ideal for a visit to La Jola area. The staff were very good about allowing us to change to a different room soon after our arrival as well as accommodating changes to our schedule. This was highly appreciated. For that reason we may consider returning. The decor in the rooms is old and well beyond refurbishment. We were pleased to see major renovation efforts underway at the hotel however it would have been good to know that prior to booking. In addition the rooms are old and musty and currently can not be compared to the equivalent value when paying the same price at a larger chain.
Very Good. Comfortable and good value for price. BUT Old with remodeling happening during stay.

Really nice place. Hotel is in last phase of a remodel and we had one of the new rooms. Bathroom was super nice new bed really comfortable and it was nice and quiet at night. Just a block or so from nearest beach. The manager Tricia was wonderfully friendly and helpful. Would stay here again.

Disappointed Updated room decor was nice. Under renovation. Renovated rooms not ready for occupancy. No towel bars in bathroom no soap dish in shower. shower drain cover not secured no phone in room. WiFi did not work. Selection of TV channels horrible ie no sports channels FOX or ESPN but dozens of home shopping and infomercial channels and Good Morning Japan.

Convenience only. The front counter person was exceptional pleasant polite informative. everything you look for in this position. I wish I had her working for meThe cost was higher than expected for rooms under construction. Although it is considered to be part of La Jola it is closer to Pacific Beach. Parking was horrendous. We did receive an updated room. It was very sterile. very industrial like. Not very beach like at all. The bed was comfortable. but I would not recommend this site to anyone else.

Nightmare check before you book. The rooms have been refitted and will be nice once the snagging is complete eg no hooks in bathroom dust from building works outside. The hotel is very near the beach and restaurants so great location and will be good when it is finished. Staff on front desk were very helpful but i felt I was conned into booking this hotel and paying the rate that I paid. A major refurbishment was underway when we arrived and we were allocated a room right beside the works. There was excessive noise until 630 in the evening and then from 8 in the morning and lots of dust. Builders were walking past our room all day. The hotel and bokingcom websites do not flag this up and I alerted them over a week ago so suggest you check before you book. The hotel description says it is a boutique hotel with all year round pool which was a reason we booked it but the pool was set up as the builders yard. Breakfast was served in the reception which was a converted bedroom and it was chaotic and very disappointing.

The hotel is undergoing major renovations. As a result some guest areas were not finished like no countertops in the breakfast room. Overall we liked the location and staff were sweet and apologetic about the inconvenience.

I liked the new design of the rooms and the quaint feel of the place. However while we stayed they were taking photos of the place which restricted us from parking in the front parking lot. They advertised bikes to use from the hotel for guests but those were not available yet even though they were on hand. The lower floor rooms were a bit noisy from your neighbor above you. Breakfast was average but not bad with some pastries bagels and cereal. The coffee was definitely really good though. They provided a few cups in your room and more in the lobby. I think once they get the remodel completed and have all of their amenities available it will be much more of a desirable place to stay.

Excellent location. Good size rooms with comfortable beds and other amenities. Rooms are under renovation so there is a bit of noise but this is temporary. Few negatives Washrooms have sliding door which do not close properly. Coffee machine did not work in both the rooms we occupied.

Looking forward to getting back to San Diego. Staff was friendly. Room was very comfortable and clean. Close to beach has a pool and jacuzi. Not as touristy least while we were there than other areas we visited which we prefer. There were daily renovations being done on the outside of the property during our stay and the reason for the lower than normal price but we liked it to stay a couple more days than planned.

Great staff. The staff is very friendly. They really try to make things right for you and to help. They smile all the time. It puts you in a good mood. The property has been doing amazing renovations. They could redo the pool area as well. That would be great. An earlier check in time would be nice too.
Good location. Recently remodeled with good amenities the mattress was old though.

Rooms. B Service. D The rooms and exterior are modern and well kept. Though the room is a bit cave like. Everything looked like it had been recently updated except the A C That A C turned out to be the issue. It did n’t work which we discovered on a hot afternoon coming in from the beach. I went to the front desk and they told me the maintenance guy had left 30 minutes before. “ Ok can you call him ”. “ No ”. “ Could you move us to another room ”. “ No we are full I can offer you a discount ”. “ I ’l just take a refund and we ’l go elsewhere ”. “ I ca n’t do that ”. “ Can I talk to a manager ”. “ She wo n’t be here until tomorrow morning ”. We ended up staying the night because we had already payed the ludicrous rate for a glorified Motel 6. Sleep came slowly because of the heat. The next day we went to the beach again. When we returned in the evening the A C had n’t been touched. Cue night two of poor sleep. A day later and I have still not seen any discount refund on my card. Never again.

Rooms. B Service. D The rooms and exterior are modern and well kept. Though the room is a bit cave like. Everything looked like it had been recently updated except the A C That A C turned out to be the issue. It did n’t work which we discovered on a hot afternoon coming in from the beach. I went to the front desk and they told me the maintenance guy had left 30 minutes before. “ Ok can you call him ”. “ No ”. “ Could you move us to another room ”. “ No we are full I can offer you a discount ”. “ I ’l just take a refund and we ’l go elsewhere ”. “ I ca n’t do that ”. “ Can I talk to a manager ”. “ She wo n’t be here until tomorrow morning ”. We ended up staying the night because we had already payed the ludicrous rate for a glorified Motel 6. Sleep came slowly because of the heat. The next day we went to the beach again. When we returned in the evening the A C had n’t been touched. Cue night two of poor sleep. A day later and I have still not seen any discount refund on my card. Never again.

I was rubbed with the price. I would never use or recommend the Bokingcom or stay the Shoal hotel. Bokingcom does n’t provide the best price. I feel like I was robbed. I payed 250 per night. It was n’t worth it at all. Now they sell it for 149. Never pay more than 150That place is far away from the center 40 min walking. I will describe this hotel as just a renovated motel. I asked to return me at least some money but nobody was helpful.

We stayed at the Shoal for 4 nights. It was an excellent experience all around. The rooms were clean and beautiful. I believe they just renovated and they need a great job. The staff were amazing. They were so friendly and helpful and I want to be friends with all of them. The pool and hot tub were clean and inviting. The rooms had a huge TV and the beds we are comfortable and clean. The beach was just down the road maybe a three minute walk. We will definitely be back.

This place exceeded my expectations. It is exactly as it looks a revamped motel. they have done an amazing job at equipping the rooms with every modern comfort super fast and free. WiFi mini fridge microwave safe top quality shampoos soaps hairdryer. it is all here in a super stylish room with an ultra comfy bed. Location is unbeatable a 3minute walk to a super special beach with direct access and an adjacent walking path. Bikes are available too. The pool looked cute although I did not have a chance to use it work trip. The best part. The very friendly accommodating staff. do not hesitate. book The Shoal La Jola it is likely the best overall value in the area.
